animeTitle: One Piece: Mezase! Kaizoku Yakyuu Ou
animeDescription: Luffy and crew takes on Arlong's crew in baseball. Announced by Bon Clay and Buggy.  (Source: ANN)
animeCharacters: ['Monkey D., Luffy', 'Roronoa, Zoro', 'Sanji', 'Nico, Robin', 'Tony Tony, Chopper', 'Usopp', 'Nami', 'Bentham', 'Buggy', 'Arlong']
